translated: It causes the grasping “this is mine.”🔽The fault that arises from pride is the grasping “this is mine” or “this is my self.”

original: bdag gi snyam pa'i yongs su 'dzin pa dam po skye bar byed pa des 'ching bar byed do //
analyzed: bdag gi snyam pa'i yongs su 'dzin pa dam po skye bar byed pa des 'ching bar byed do //
translated: That grasping causes bondage.

original: de ltar gyur pa des kyang nyes pa'i tshogs ci zhig bskyed ce na /🔽der ni nga rgyal dregs dang 'dod sogs kyis //
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa des kyang nyes pa'i tshogs ci zhig bskyed ce na / der ni nga rgyal dregs dang 'dod sogs kyis //
translated: What collection of faults arises from that?

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: It says: “There, through pride, conceit, desire, and so on,🔽one is bound by the fetters of miserliness and so on.”

original: der ni zhes bya ba nga'i zhes yongs su 'dzin pa skye ba'i gnas skabs de'i tshe na nga rgyal la sogs pa'i nyes pa 'byung ste /
analyzed: der ni zhes bya ba nga'i zhes yongs su 'dzin pa skye ba'i gnas skabs de'i tshe na nga rgyal la sogs pa'i nyes pa 'byung ste /
translated: At that time, when there is the occasion of the arising of the grasping of “mine,” faults such as pride arise.

original: nga rgyal ni nga rgyal dang lhag pa'i nga rgyal la sogs pa'i nyes pa'o //
analyzed: nga rgyal ni nga rgyal dang lhag pa'i nga rgyal la sogs pa'i nyes pa'o //
translated: Pride is the fault of pride, overpride, etc.

original: dregs pa ni sems rgyas shing gzengs mtho ba'o //
analyzed: dregs pa ni sems rgyas shing gzengs mtho ba'o //
translated: Arrogance is the inflation and haughtiness of mind.

original: 'dod pa ni 'dod pa ste des chags pa'i yul la sred pa skyed pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa ni 'dod pa ste des chags pa'i yul la sred pa skyed pa'o //
translated: Desire is the desire for the object of attachment that it generates.

original: sogs pa smos pas ni zhe sdang dang gti mug la sogs pa nyon mongs @212b pa gzhan rnams bsdus la de dag gis kyang ci zhig byed ce na /
analyzed: sogs pa smos pas ni zhe sdang dang gti mug la sogs pa nyon mongs @212b pa gzhan rnams bsdus la de dag gis kyang ci zhig byed ce na /
translated: The word “etc.” includes other afflictions such as hatred and delusion. What do they do?

original: khros pa'i dgra bzhin du ni rnam par 'joms //🔽zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: khros pa'i dgra bzhin du ni rnam par 'joms // zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: They destroy like an angry enemy.

original: 'di ltar zhe 'gras par gyur pa'i dgra bo dag shin tu khros pa na srog dang bral bar byed pa la sogs pa'i gnod pa du ma skyed par byed pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: 'di ltar zhe 'gras par gyur pa'i dgra bo dag shin tu khros pa na srog dang bral bar byed pa la sogs pa'i gnod pa du ma skyed par byed pa de bzhin du /
translated: Thus, when angry enemies are very angry, they generate many harms such as taking life.

original: nyon mongs pa'i tshogs de dag gis kyang dge ba'i srog 'phrog cing 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs skyed par byed do //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i tshogs de dag gis kyang dge ba'i srog 'phrog cing 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs skyed par byed do //
translated: And those collections of afflictions also steal the life of virtue and generate various sufferings of change.

original: bdag tu lta ba ni nyes pa thams cad kyi gzhi yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag tu lta ba ni nyes pa thams cad kyi gzhi yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the view of self is the basis of all faults.🔽And that is explained by the master Pūrṇavardhana:

original: de yang / bdag yod na ni gzhan du 'du shes shing //
analyzed: de yang / bdag yod na ni gzhan du 'du shes shing //
translated: When there is a self, there is the conception of other.🔽From the aspects of self and other come grasping and hatred.

original: bdag gzhan cha las yongs su 'dzin dang sdang // 'di gnyis dang ni kun tu 'brel pa las //
analyzed: bdag gzhan cha las yongs su 'dzin dang sdang // 'di gnyis dang ni kun tu 'brel pa las //
translated: From being completely bound by these two

original: nyes pa thams cad rab tu skye bar 'gyur //🔽zhes slob dpon tshogs kyi grags pas bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: nyes pa thams cad rab tu skye bar 'gyur // zhes slob dpon tshogs kyi grags pas bshad pa yin no //
translated: all faults arise.

original: nga rgyal la sogs pa'i nyes pa de dag nyid kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs bskyed pa'i dpe bstan pa'i phyir /🔽gang tshe bdud kyi sde ltar 'jigs pa yi //
analyzed: nga rgyal la sogs pa'i nyes pa de dag nyid kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs bskyed pa'i dpe bstan pa'i phyir / gang tshe bdud kyi sde ltar 'jigs pa yi //
translated: In order to teach the example of generating the antidotes to those faults such as pride,🔽it is said:🔽When the net of afflictions

original: nyon mongs dra ba kun nas bdo gyur pa //
analyzed: nyon mongs dra ba kun nas bdo gyur pa //
translated: is spread out like the army of demons,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: and so on.

original: dus gang gi tshe na bdud kyi sde zhes bya ba bdud ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug ste /
analyzed: dus gang gi tshe na bdud kyi sde zhes bya ba bdud ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug ste /
translated: At any time, the army of demons is the lord of the desire realm.

original: de'i sde ni dpung tshogs yin la /
analyzed: de'i sde ni dpung tshogs yin la /
translated: His army is his host.

original: de dag kyang mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs shing rgol ba dang g-yul du 'jug pa'i tshul du ma ston pas shin tu 'jigs su rung ba yin no //
analyzed: de dag kyang mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs shing rgol ba dang g-yul du 'jug pa'i tshul du ma ston pas shin tu 'jigs su rung ba yin no //
translated: They are very frightening because they display various weapons and the manner of attacking and engaging in battle.

original: ltar zhes bya ba ni 'dra ba ste /
analyzed: ltar zhes bya ba ni 'dra ba ste /
translated: Like that means similar.

original: nyon mongs pa'i tshogs rnams kyang gnod pa sna tshogs skyed pas 'jigs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i tshogs rnams kyang gnod pa sna tshogs skyed pas 'jigs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The hosts of afflictions are also frightening because they generate various harms.

original: nyon mongs pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa yin la /🔽dra ba ni de dag gi tshogs mang po la bya ba'am /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa yin la / dra ba ni de dag gi tshogs mang po la bya ba'am /
translated: The afflictions are attachment and so on.

original: de dag gis kun nas dkris pas bsdams shing 'ching bar byed pa yin la /
analyzed: de dag gis kun nas dkris pas bsdams shing 'ching bar byed pa yin la /
translated: The net is a collection of those or it is the binding and fettering that occurs through their entanglements.

original: de lta bu'i nyon mongs pa de kun nas bdo bar gyur cing yul gyi bag la nyal sad par byas te /
analyzed: de lta bu'i nyon mongs pa de kun nas bdo bar gyur cing yul gyi bag la nyal sad par byas te /
translated: Such an army of afflictions is rampant and awakens the latent states of objects.

original: nyon mongs pa'i kun nas dkris pa rnam pa thams cad du 'bar bar gyur pa na nyon mongs pa'i tshogs nyid bdud kyi sde yin la ;
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i kun nas dkris pa rnam pa thams cad du 'bar bar gyur pa na nyon mongs pa'i tshogs nyid bdud kyi sde yin la ;
translated: When the afflictions are blazing in every way, the very mass of afflictions is the army of Mara.

original: de lta bu mi bzad pa'i nyon mongs pa'i shugs 'bar bar gyur pa /
analyzed: de lta bu mi bzad pa'i nyon mongs pa'i shugs 'bar bar gyur pa /
translated: When the power of the afflictions is blazing in this way,

original: de tshe dus mtshan mi bzad lta bur ni //
analyzed: de tshe dus mtshan mi bzad lta bur ni //
translated: then it is like the unbearable messengers of the Lord of Death.

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: As for the word “then,”

original: dus zhes bya ba ni gshin rje'i pho nya yod de /
analyzed: dus zhes bya ba ni gshin rje'i pho nya yod de /
translated: the messengers of the Lord of Death are present.

original: des de gang gi mtshan mo skyes bu'i mgul du zhags pas btags te khyer bar 'dod pa'i mtshan @213a * //
analyzed: des de gang gi mtshan mo skyes bu'i mgul du zhags pas btags te khyer bar 'dod pa'i mtshan @213a * //
translated: The time at which they wish to bind the neck of a person with a noose and lead him away

original: ma de ni dus mtshan zhes bya'o //
analyzed: ma de ni dus mtshan zhes bya'o //
translated: is called “the time of death.”

original: lta bur zhes bya ba ni 'dra ba ste /
analyzed: lta bur zhes bya ba ni 'dra ba ste /
translated: As for the word “like,”

original: nyon mongs pa'i dra ba de ni de dang tshul 'dra ste /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i dra ba de ni de dang tshul 'dra ste /
translated: the net of the afflictions is similar to that.

original: gang gis na shin tu mi bzad pa'i 'jigs pa skyed par chos mthun pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gis na shin tu mi bzad pa'i 'jigs pa skyed par chos mthun pa yin no //
translated: They are similar in that they both produce a most unbearable fear.

original: de lta bur zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de lta bur zhes bya ba ni /
translated: As for the word “thus,”

original: nag po'i phyogs kyi mun pa rnam par 'phel //
analyzed: nag po'i phyogs kyi mun pa rnam par 'phel //
translated: the darkness of the dark side increases.

original: zhes bya ba bdud kyi phyogs dkar po'i chos dang mi mthun par gyur pa'i rmongs pa'i mun pa de rnam par 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: zhes bya ba bdud kyi phyogs dkar po'i chos dang mi mthun par gyur pa'i rmongs pa'i mun pa de rnam par 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur ba'am /
translated: The darkness of delusion, which is not in accord with the bright qualities of the Dharma, increases and spreads.

original: yang na nag po'i phyogs zhes bya ba ni zla ba mar ngo la bya la de'i mun pa smag tu gyur pa'i nang na dgra bo 'ga' zhig gi mtshon cha sna tshogs kyi char phab na shin tu 'jigs pa yin pa dang 'dri bar nyon mongs pa'i phyogs
analyzed: yang na nag po'i phyogs zhes bya ba ni zla ba mar ngo la bya la de'i mun pa smag tu gyur pa'i nang na dgra bo 'ga' zhig gi mtshon cha sna tshogs kyi char phab na shin tu 'jigs pa yin pa dang 'dri bar nyon mongs pa'i phyogs
translated: Or, the dark side is the waning moon. When an enemy shoots a rain of various weapons in the darkness of the night, it is very frightening.

original: kyi mun pas bsgribs shing dkar po'i chos kyi snang ba dang bral ba na /
analyzed: kyi mun pas bsgribs shing dkar po'i chos kyi snang ba dang bral ba na /
translated: Similarly, when the darkness of the afflictions obscures and one is devoid of the light of bright qualities,

analyzed: gnod pa dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: various harms and sufferings increase.

original: de ltar dpe'i tshul du ma bstan pas bdag tu lta ba las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa'i tshogs rnams shin tu 'jigs su rung bar bstan pa yin la de nyid kyis na zhi bar bya ba'i phyir sdig pa smod pa'i sgo nas 'chags par 'dod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar dpe'i tshul du ma bstan pas bdag tu lta ba las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa'i tshogs rnams shin tu 'jigs su rung bar bstan pa yin la de nyid kyis na zhi bar bya ba'i phyir sdig pa smod pa'i sgo nas 'chags par 'dod pa'i phyir /
translated: Since it is taught in this way by way of example, the mass of afflictions that arise from the view of self are taught to be extremely frightening.🔽In order to pacify them, one wishes to confess one’s misdeeds by way of regretting them.

original: sdig pa brjod bgyi rjes 'gyod brnag dka' zhing //🔽zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: sdig pa brjod bgyi rjes 'gyod brnag dka' zhing // zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it says, “I will declare my misdeeds, which are difficult to bear with regret.”

original: kye bcom ldan 'das khyed kyi spyan sngar sdug pa dang mi sdug pa dag gi phyir sdig pa du ma bgyis shing bsags pa'i sdig pa gang yin pa de brjod par bgyi zhing rjes su bsgrag par bgyi'o //
analyzed: kye bcom ldan 'das khyed kyi spyan sngar sdug pa dang mi sdug pa dag gi phyir sdig pa du ma bgyis shing bsags pa'i sdig pa gang yin pa de brjod par bgyi zhing rjes su bsgrag par bgyi'o //
translated: O Bhagavān, in your presence, I will declare and proclaim the misdeeds that I have done and accumulated for the sake of what is attractive and what is unattractive.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What are they like?

original: rjes 'gyod brnag dka' zhing zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rjes 'gyod brnag dka' zhing zhes bya ba ste /
translated: They are difficult to bear with regret.

original: gang zhig byas na rjes su 'gyod pa'i sems kyi rgyud sred par nus pa brnag dka' zhing bzod par dka' ba skye ba de ni sdig pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //

translated: Because that which is able to generate a mental continuum that regrets what was done is of the nature of evil, difficult to bear, and difficult to endure.

analyzed: gzhan yang ji lta bu zhe na / skye ba sdug bsngal 'gyur ba mi bzad lags //

analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Birth is suffering, and the transformation of suffering is unbearable.
